title: House of the Lost
description:
For my birthday this year I'm giving you all a present! The House of the Lost Unlock is currently on Sale for only $2.99!

House of the Lost is an action roguelike that challenges you, and a friend, to rescue your sister from an ever-changing haunted house! You'll need to fight monsters, solve puzzles, craft weapons, and uncover secrets to save your sister and get our alive.

Thanks to OUYA we've been able to add physical controls and couch co-op to make this the best version of the game ever released.

GAME FEATURES

COUCH CO-OP
Tackle the challenge alone or with a friend in this hardcore roguelike adventure! 

RANDOM LEVELS
Each time you play House of the Lost you'll experience a different set of levels and challenges. Enemies will change, map layouts will be different, and the House will test you at every turn.

WEAPON CRAFTING
Combine weapons and items you find along the way to make crazy new weapons to aid you in your quest. 

EPIC BOSS BATTLES
The zombies and monsters that haunt these halls are deadly enough but nothing will be able to prepare you for the boss battles that await.

MULTIPLE ENVIRONMENTS
You'll find four different environments within the house that all have their own challenges and bosses to face.

SECRETS GALORE
Walk through walls, track down clues, and do your best to unlock the secrets of the House. It may be your only chance at survival.

NEW GAME PLUS
Are you bad enough to beat the House? Then suit back up and jump in again with our just added New Game Plus mode!
